DEFINITIONS OF LIFESTYLE MEDICINE There doesn't seem to be a standard definition, but the available definitions are really saying basically the same thing: The use of lifestyle interventions within conventional medicine to lower the risk for a number of lifestyle-related chronic diseases or, if such conditions are already present, to serve as an adjunct to the management plan.
